poem.title: That 'can' in Scottish English covers 'may'
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Oh y canny shove yr granny aff a bus. Ach yr granny (that canny Be shoved aff a bus) is a cowboy. As is the granny that can. To be clear: Canny means gauny no dae that or else? And how many grannies have you seen eject From the deck of a Leyland Atlantean, eh? And how many grandweans in juvenile courts Hauled up for skipping their fare And the ticket in grandmamaâ€™s pocket?
